document_data.name: Mosque of a Thousand Fountains
document_data.source: [[A Dozen and One Adventures|A Dozen and One Adventures (Campaign Book)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of a Thousand Fountains''' was a temple dedicated to [[Zann]] found in [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The mosque actually straddled a large section of the city walls.
document_data.Activities: This mosque was not only a house of worship for Zann, but also served as a small university for the wealthy elite of Muluk. A well-documented library was accessible by the public six days per week. Much of its contents dealt with Muluk's rich history.
